narratives.title: Your Visibility Story This Week
narratives.body: EVI increased 4.1 points to 67.4, moving you firmly into Competitive territory. The TechCrunch mention on Jan 5th drove significant AI citation growth (+17%), with Perplexity and Claude now citing your EVI methodology. Your Visibility driver leads at 72.5, while Momentum shows the strongest growth trajectory.

narratives.title: Authority Building Opportunity
narratives.body: Your Authority score (64.8) is trailing Visibility. Structured data coverage at 48% is leaving AI comprehension gains on the table. Implementing schema markup on your top 20 pages could push Authority above 70, adding ~3 points to overall EVI.

narratives.title: Share of Voice Pressure
narratives.body: Despite strong Citation Velocity (+17% WoW), traditional Share of Voice declined 2% as HubSpot and Clearbit increased PR activity. Content Velocity ratio (0.8x) indicates competitors are outpacing your publishing cadence. Recommend increasing to 6-8 pieces/week to maintain Momentum trajectory.

narratives.title: Competitor Movement
narratives.body: HubSpot's EVI rose 6.2 points this week, primarily driven by a Wall Street Journal feature. Their Visibility score now exceeds yours by 8 points. However, your Authority growth rate is 2.1x theirsâ€”maintain this advantage to close the gap.

top_movers.reason: TechCrunch AI coverage mention drove +17% AI citations
Schema markup deployed on 12 product pages
Published 6 pieces this week vs competitor avg of 4
HubSpot increased PR activity, SOV declined 2%

upgrade_hooks.message: See your competitors' EVI scores, driver breakdowns, and week-over-week changes. Know exactly where HubSpot and Clearbit are winning.
Get 14-day EVI projections based on scheduled content, pending press, and historical patterns. See your path to Dominant status.
Connect every action to its EVI impact. See exactly which press hits, content pieces, and SEO wins drove your score changes.

scenarios.label: Deploy Schema Fixes
scenarios.description: Implement structured data on 12 product pages to improve AI comprehension

scenarios.label: Secure 2 PR Placements
scenarios.description: Land coverage in TechCrunch and VentureBeat within 30 days

scenarios.label: Increase Content Velocity
scenarios.description: Publish 6+ pieces per week to outpace competitor average
